name: PIXELINING
description:
Welcome Bob, as the king of the people you must take care of your kingdom by improving it and facing the threats of other kingdoms. Obviously to obtain resources you must go to a mine and it depends on your luck what you find there. In addition to fighting with enemy kingdoms you can participate in races. I wish you the best luck in the world, you will be able to achieve what you set out to do.

Bye Bye.

oh, yes, and, please.

DON'T BE LIKE HIM
